methods.name: operator_start
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate an operator (e.g. ShortestPath), where its result may be given a name for future reference.

operator.description: The neo4j operator to be used (e.g. ShortestPath)

ref_name.description: A reference name of the result, to be used later in the rest of the query

args.description: A string of arguments, to be passed to the operator function
